item.description:
Jillian's is offering free bowling and free shoe rentals for our group from 7-9pm! They are also providing complimentary chips/salsa. There is a full cash bar available and members are welcome to order their own additional food too. This will be a great night! Be sure to bring socks with you for bowling.

Please only sign up if you can definitely attend since this will be a popular event. If your plans change, please update your RSVP.

This event is free, but members are asked to make a voluntary $5 cash donation to Project Smile, a non profit organization which helps children involved in traumatic events.

We look forward to seeing you. If you have trouble finding us, call Catherine at 774 232 0000.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine on 3rd floor near shoe rental area or ask hostess for Catherine/Meet Up Group. My cell is 774 232 0000
item.name: Free Bowling and Fun at Jillian's Lucky Strike, Boston
